name: How to read piano sheet music
name_original: How to read piano sheet music
description:
Play as a certain composer in an adventure to gather the power of music in order to escape the mysterious castle!

Important: press enter while in game to check the songs you have, each has a different effect, so try them out in different situations.

By request here are the song notes:

extra jump r-a

dash f-s-w

shockwave w-r-wait-d

slow motion f-q-r-a

secret r-r-q-w-wait-r-wait-e

There might be a different ending...

Made for the 48 hour Wikihow game jam #2

Theme used: https://www.wikihow.com/Read-Piano-Sheet-Music
